name: Action Trainer
description:
The Game:

A prototype showing a basic training room where the player can bounce a ball around a room with attacks (strike and shoot) and movement (jump and dash).  

Tips:

Jump, Strike and Shoot can be held.

Press P key or Start button to pause

Inspiration:

I wanted to create a simple game that can work as a base for physics combat and physics movement for casual play. I also wanted to put myself out for constructive feedback/criticism. You know what they say "fail faster."

You Should Know:

I used my last project as a base for this one. If you look at the source code in unity you can see extra code that is and is not in the final build. 

Resources:

All assets in the project are royalty free except for the incompetech music in which you need to copy and paste the license to use as royalty free. 

Hand drawn gesture sprites drawn from the character-Susanoo drawn in clip studio. Reference poses came from: https://www.spriters-resource.com/

Hand drawn tiles drawn in clip studio
